name: Happy Hairdresser (Dressup)
description: We entrust you today with a hairdressing salon on a beautiful paradise beach and you will be able to pratice your hair cutting skills with vacationists looking for a summer look. But you will have to stay very focused because your customers have a very definite idea of what they want and you will have to reproduce the model they brought. Look carefully at hair lengths, dyes... without forgetting to draw on eyebrows or add the ultimate accessory to complete your work.
